properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Edisto Beach SC to Savannah GA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 6 at 3:41AM EST until February 7 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 5 to 8 ft possible.

* WHERE...Edisto Beach to Savannah out 20 NM.

* WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to noon EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON EST FRIDAY
